DOC.brief_summary: The general movement and the electroencephalogram analysis of the preterm have a high predictive value of the neuro-developmental outcome of the infants.
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between the Analysis of the Rapid Cortical Oscillations, the General Movements of the Preterm's and the Cerebral Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: Compare the technical and the predictive characteristics of the qualitative analysis of the spontaneous motility with those of actual exams of reference diagnosis : magnetic resonance imaging, electroencephalogram and transfontanellar imaging.
DOC.criteria: Children been born between 15/01/08 and 15/01/10 children whose term is lower than 28 weeks of amenorrhoea Born child superior to 28 weeks of amenorrhoea presenting child a genic syndrome, an evolutionary neurological disease, a pathology malformative
